RelatedSentence: A survey last year from the National Association of Colleges and Employers suggests unpaid internships do n't help students land full - time jobs .
A survey last year from the National Association of Colleges and Employers suggests unpaid internships do n't help students land full - time jobs .
A survey last year from the National Association of Colleges and Employers suggests unpaid internships do n't help students land full - time jobs .
Alums of unpaid internships had full - time job offers at nearly the same rate as those who had no internships at all - about 37 % , compared with 62 % for those with paid internships .
